name: The Boring City
description:
You have crash landed in a boring city and your spaceship is going to blow up in 2 minutes. What to do!? Blowing up the city seems like the only sensible option!

The boring city is a game about blowing stuff up. The more stuff you blow up the higher your score gets. Simple, right? Think of it as my love letter to the Tony Hawk's Pro Skater and Battlefield Bad Company series.

If you find any bugs please let me know! Have fun blowing stuff up!

UPDATE 1.1: Added mouse and keyboard support. A controller is still highly recommended.
